Field Detail

FACTOR_OF_THREADS_TO_WORKERS

public static float FACTOR_OF_THREADS_TO_WORKERS
This variable determines how many threads compared to workers are created. A value of 2.5 means that the system will adapt the parallelism in the way that in the end 2.5 more threads exists than workers.

setParallelismByNumberOfWorkers

public void setParallelismByNumberOfWorkers(int numberOfWorkers)
This method sets the parallelism to a optimal value depending on the number of workers. The constant FACTOR_OF_THREADS_TO_WORKERS controls the behavior of this method.

Parameters:
numberOfWorkers -
